CITY COUNCIL
ROUNDTABLE/WORKING MEETING
~ MINUTES ~
Tuesday, May 24, 2022

6:00 PM

Sullivan Chamber
795 Massachusetts Avenue
Cambridge, MA 02139

The City Council hold a virtual Roundtable meeting to receive a training on Robert’s Rules from
parliamentarian Ann G. MacFarlane.
